mapper.insert: INSERT INTO options(o_no, o_name, c_no) VALUES(o_no.nextval, #{o_name}, #{c_no})
INSERT INTO goods_option(g_no, o_no, value, go_stock, extra_cost, required) VALUES(#{g_no}, #{o_no}, #{value}, #{go_stock}, #{extra_cost}, #{required})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM goods_option go, options o WHERE o.o_no = go.o_no AND go.g_no = #{g_no}
SELECT * FROM goods_option WHERE o_no = #{o_no} AND g_no = #{g_no}
mapper.update: UPDATE options SET o_name = #{o_name} WHERE o_no = #{o_no}
UPDATE goods_option SET go_stock = #{go_stock} WHERE o_no = #{o_no} AND g_no = #{g_no}
